thoughts.text: I think the issue with the modified command to set the value of the TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN environment variable is that the jq command is not correctly parsing the Twitter API credentials file.
thoughts.reasoning: The error message returned when I executed the modified command to set the value of the TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN environment variable indicates that there is an issue with the way the jq command is parsing the Twitter API credentials file. This may be caused by an issue with the way the file is written or an issue with the way the jq command is being executed. I think that the issue is with the way the jq command is parsing the Twitter API credentials file.
